summary: An email from Marc A. Weinstein to himself scheduling a Skype meeting titled 'Epstein Estate' for November 9, 2020, at 4:30 PM Eastern Time. The email contains dial-in information and conference details for the meeting.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.context: Sends and receives an email scheduling a meeting about the Epstein Estate, appears to be organizing or participating in the discussion.

events.title: Epstein Estate Meeting
events.description: A scheduled Skype meeting to discuss the Epstein Estate.

keyFacts: A meeting titled 'Epstein Estate' was scheduled via Skype for November 9, 2020, at 4:30 PM Eastern Time.
Marc A. Weinstein was both the sender and recipient of the email scheduling this meeting.
The document is a routine scheduling email, providing dial-in numbers and conference details for an international call.
